title: (BUG) After patch 9.15, TFT starts while i'm still on the loading screen, every single time
body:
Hello. After this new patch, all TFT games starts while i'm still on the loading screen. Then when the game comes up, i have like 2 seconds or less to pick a champ from the roulette, usually cannot. Anyone else experience this too? 

Another bug that persists since previous patches is that sometimes some of the champs available to buy are bogus and cannot be purchased. You click, drag and nothing works so, you lose that champ. 

Extras/suggestions: How come noone complains about having Leona stun for so long?? 5/8/11 seconds is beyond broken.

Please add the option to change chat font size on TFT.

Add option to mute enemy pings (too many players spam this).

The Victory/Defeat animation is now broken, really low resolution.

We would love the ability to spectate TFT games too!

The item field could be arranged in a much more confortable way. I believe that the 5 gold urns space could be shrinked and moved up to allow a 
bigger and wider item field.

TFT Match history/replays?

Fix the accidental pickup of pirate treasure box when going or coming from another player's field. Sometimes we want to leave the box untouched while stacking coins so we can pick it much later and complete the "20 coins in a single round" mission.

That's it for now.

replies.body: Same thing happens to me. I don't load early enough to pick from the first roulette at all.

The bogus champ thing I have had happen a few times. What i have learned is everything is shifted. Buy the champs to the left and right and you should get what you first wabted. It sucks and if it's the far left or right portrait you may not get it. But a work around for now atleast.
